joke: Why did the scarecrow win an award?
punchline: Because he was outstanding in his field.

joke: Why did the bicycle fall over?
Why do seagulls fly over the ocean?
punchline: Because if they flew over the bay, they wouldd be bagels!

joke: Why dont skeletons fight each other?
Why cant your nose be 12 inches long?
punchline: Because then it would be a foot.

joke: Why was the math book sad?
Why dont oysters donate to charity?
